description: Ultra-lightweight, with the Massone Sport Shorts, you might have to double check that you're wearing shorts at all! Cut for a sporty look, these shorts fuse polyamide and elastane - for a finish that’s ultra-lightweight yet enormously durable and allows full freedom of movement. They’re the perfect shorts for active projects, sweaty gyms and bouldering halls, and extra hot days. Also good to know: almost half of the fabric consists of recycled polyamide. So, what are you waiting for?
name: Mammut Massone Sport Shorts - Mens
